adHeader: Army Veteran, offering manual/ stick shift practice
adDetails: I am offering my vehicle, myself experience in practicing to drive manual/stick shift vehicle. I am not a certified trainer but I have driven cross country, lived a few years in different states and have a valid European license/ and I had driven/ lived in Europe for a few years. I currently do rideshares in the south bay area, and also all the bay area. I can get to you, if you would like to practice.
